document.full_text: vancouver canucks defenseman aaron rome has been banned from playing in the rest of the stanley cup finals after his late hit on boston bruins forward nathan horton left his opponent severely concussed and also out of the series.
document.title: rome banned from finals after horton knockout
lines_and_colors: vancouver canucks defenseman aaron rome has been banned from playing in the rest of the stanley cup finals after his late hit on boston bruins forward nathan horton left his opponent severely concussed and also out of the series.
